name: Day 13: Overlay
description:
Welcome to day 13 of 15 in the Figma prototype challenge! In this challenge you will be adding tooltip overlays to a map's pins. In the file you will find:

  1. A gif demonstrating the animation
  2. A workspace for you to build your prototype
  3. The built out prototype to use as reference
  4. Community examples demonstrating other applications of the feature


Feel free to follow the prompt and add any other cool elements to your prototype. Whatever you choose to do, don't forget to post a Remix or publish a new Community File with the tag FigmaPrototypeChallenge! Happy prototyping! ðŸŽ‰
